title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 175-2.4 - Emergency transfer requests
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 175-2.4 - Emergency transfer requests

State Regulations
A juvenile delinquent may be placed in a secure facility
pending a transfer hearing when there is a danger of safety. Notice of the
charges shall be provided to the juvenile delinquent within 48 hours of the
transfer, excluding weekends or holidays. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
175-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
